synopsis: With Koumei's strategism and the five strong warriors Kan'u, Chouhi, Chouun, Bachou and Kouchuu's power, the bandits do not stand a chance when they are confronted in battle.
Ryubi is cornered by the trio bandits who have perverse thoughts about her. Kan-u's group arrives just in time and with one swing, Kan-u sends the trio away saving Ryubi from the bandits.
Ryuubi and her party come Kousonsan's city. Kousonsan welcomes them and is surprised that Ryuubi comes with them. A game of wits, strength and technique ensues with the ornate sword as the prize.

title.jp: The Three Cho Sisters Acquire the 'Crucial Keys to the Way of Peace'

synopsis: The Three Cho Sisters meet a traveling magician and receive a mysterious book that amplifies their magical powers as well as their traveling act.

title.jp: Kakuka and Teiiku Come Into Soso's Service

synopsis: While on their merry travels, our heroines encounter Kakuka and Teiiku, two aspiring strategists who seek employment under Lord Soso.

The Three Cho Sisters learn to use the manipulative magical powers of the Crucial Keys to win over the crowd. Soso holds a gourmet food tasting session and tests the culinary prowess of a local chef named Tenâ€™i.

title.jp: Chinkyu Is Taken in by Ryofu

synopsis: Chinkyu, loyal companion and strategist to Ryofu, reveals her life story to our heroines. New friendships are formed and Rin Rin parts with her special dog charm.
Enjutsu desires to have a villa built in the place where a haunted shrine stands. She tasks the girls to destroy the monster that lurks within the shrine in exchange for Ryubi's family sword.

title.jp: Gakushin, Riten and Ukin Protect a Village

synopsis: When Relha's group discover a treasure map they find themselves being pursued by an unknown force. When the force they think is following them turns out different from what they imagined, it's secrets are then revealed.
As the Queen expands her territory by way of war, an attempt is made on her life. With no one to blame, she holds Aisha as the prime suspect.

title.jp: Bacho Tries to Hold It in

synopsis: Aisha, Rinrin and Shuri become involved in a war between bandits and a militia, siding with the militia. During the resulting chaos, Bacho has a near-death experience.

title.jp: The General's Attempt to Suppress the Yellow Turban Rebellion

synopsis: As the bandits advance on the city, Aisha and Rinrin do everything they can to hold down the city gates and protect the villagers. Will the truth about Ryubi finally be revealed?
